!Sentry Kathaway: Hello, I am Sentry Kathaway and I watch the Neutral Zone. The Neutral Zone begins right after you cross this bridge. If you continue on the road south through the Neutral Zone, you will come to Gludio Castle and *Gludio Castle Town.* [npc_%objectId%_Chat 1|Ask about Gludio Castle Town] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
